an7.24:1.3: katame ca, bhikkhave, satta aparihaniya dhamma?
an7.24:2.1: Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na kammarama bhavissanti, na kammarata, na kammaramatam anuyutta; vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani.
an7.24:3.1: Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na bhassarama bhavissanti …pe…
an7.24:3.4: na papiccha bhavissanti na papikanam icchanam vasam gata …
an7.24:3.5: na papamitta bhavissanti na papasahaya na papasampavanka …
an7.24:3.6: na oramattakena visesadhigamena antaravosanam apajjissanti; vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani.
an7.24:4.1: Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, ime satta aparihaniya dhamma bhikkhusu thassanti, imesu ca sattasu aparihaniyesu dhammesu bhikkhu sandississanti; vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani”ti.
